contents: Article 5-2 (National-scale federation) ① A national-scale federation pursuant to Article 5 (3) cannot have a city/provincial federation. However, if the affiliated sports organizations of the (former) Korea Sports Council and the National Sports Association of the (former) National Sports Association for Life are integrated into member sports organizations and national-scale federations under them, city/provincial federations may be included as members. Revised on March 23, 2017. ② Member sports organizations shall establish separate regulations by resolution of the board of directors regarding necessary matters such as organization, operation, rights and obligations of the national federation, and shall include the following matters. Revised 2021. 10. 6. 1. Approval of the rules 2. Approval of executives 3. Examination of exceptions to the limit on the number of terms of office for executives 4. Conduct of regular audits 5. Other necessary matters ③ Deleted 2021. 10. 6. ④ Membership items An organization may grant a national federation the right to hold competitions within its jurisdiction. Revised on March 23, 2017 [This Article Newly Inserted on March 23, 2017]
